articles.content:
Floral basket to Korean embassy in Havana 
     Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The central committee of the Communist Party of Cuba sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Havana on April 15, Sun's Day , which is the birth anniversary of the President Kim Il Sung.

Kim Jong Il's work published in Tajikistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's work published in Tajikistan 
    Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully Through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation," a work published by General Secretary Kim Jong Il on April 18, Juche 87 (1998) was brought out in booklet by the Publishing House of the Leninavad regional committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan on April 13.
